Body:
"""Test create_storage_group async."""
storage_group_name = self.generate_name('sg')
volume_name = self.generate_name()
job = self.provisioning.create_storage_group(self.SRP, storage_group_name,
    self.SLO, _async=True, vol_name=volume_name)
self.addCleanup(self.delete_storage_group, storage_group_name)
self.conn.common.wait_for_job_complete(job)
storage_group_details = self.provisioning.get_storage_group(storage_group_name)
self._validate_storage_group_details(storage_group_name, storage_group_details)
